title: MUMBLE_IS_PLAYER_TALKING
content:
0x33EEF97F// MumbleIsPlayerTalking
BOOL MUMBLE_IS_PLAYER_TALKING(Player player);Parameters:player: The target player.Returns: Whether or not the player is talking.
codeBlocks:
local player = PlayerId()
-- Example usage for MUMBLE_IS_PLAYER_TALKING
MumbleIsPlayerTalking(player)
